Header: Naasz and Trunzo crowned ice cross downhill champions
Content: Cameron Naasz of the USA was crowned the men’s ice cross downhill champion after winning the ASTX 500 event in La Sarre, Canada.Naasz took the early lead in the final race of the season and held on to win ahead of Finland’s Mirko Lahti, with American Michael Iulianello finishing third.In the women’s event, Switzerland’s Anais Morand took advantage of a fall by Amanda Trunzo of the United States in the closing stages to win the race. Trunzo’s third place finish was enough to secure her the overall title.
